short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use new tab page to learn something useful!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flashie uses new tab to display useful and important information. 
Instead of watching a boring new tab page, take a look at words you have to master or... anything you'd like to be reminded of!
